newsitem.title: USA: Security Capital files $300 mln shelf debt.
newsitem.headline: Security Capital files $300 mln shelf debt.

text.p: Security Capital Pacific Trust filed Friday with the Securities and Exchange Commission a shelf registration for up to $300 million in debt securities and preferred stock.

Net proceeds will be used by the El Paso, Texas,-based real estate company to for the development and acquisition of additional multifamily properties as opportunities arise, the repayment of debt at such time and for working capital and capital improvements on properties.
No underwriters were listed in the filing.
